name: Mediterranean Chicken Wrap
description: Grilled chicken with hummus, fresh vegetables, and feta cheese wrapped in whole wheat bread. Healthy and satisfying.

instructions.instruction: Marinate chicken with olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper. Rest for 10 minutes.
Heat grill pan over medium-high heat. Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side.
Rest chicken for 5 minutes, then slice into thin strips.
Lay tortillas flat. Spread 2 tbsp hummus on each.
Layer lettuce leaves on top of hummus.
Arrange sliced chicken down the center.
Add tomato, cucumber, red onion, and olives on top.
Fold bottom of tortilla up, then roll sides in tightly.
instructions.tip: Keep it tight so filling doesn't fall out.

instructions.instruction: Cut diagonally with a sharp knife and serve.

tips: Wraps can be made ahead and refrigerated.
Warming the tortilla makes rolling easier.
Add egg whites for more protein.
Portable meal - stays good in gym bag for 4 hours.
storageInfo: Wrap in foil and refrigerate for up to 2 days. Bring to room temperature before eating.
servingSuggestion: Serve with fresh fruit or yogurt. Perfect for lunch.
variations: Use falafel and plant-based yogurt for a vegan version.
Try gluten-free tortillas for a gluten-free option.
